description: The brandy and bacon soothe the intense liver flavour of this dish.
name: Lamb Liver with Brandy & Bacon Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 medium white onion, peeled and diced

recipeInstructions.text: Heat up a pan to a medium heat with some canola oil. Fry the onions, garlic and lardons for 5 minutes while tossing. Now add the sliced liver to the pan and fry on each side for 1 minute each.
Add the brandy and vegetable stock and allow the whole dish to simmer for 15 minutes until the sauces starts to reduce. Suggested serving with roast or mashed potatoes.
